Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

Completely disable the "Behind the Lyrics" feature in the Spotify application.

Unlike the option in Spotify's playback settings to turn off Behind the Lyrics, this tweak completely disables the feature instead of keeping the card behind the album artwork. This makes it easier to swipe down to dismiss the music player, preventing the accidental swiping down on the album artwork to reveal the Behind the Lyrics card, and could also fix compatibility with certain Spotify tweaks, such as Mitsuha

No options to configure.

- Fixed an issue with the last update that caused the tweak to not function properly on versions of Spotify older than 8.4.13

- Support added for Spotify version 8.4.13
